title: Recent Apps Not Showing On Swipe, Hold, Release after Android 11 update
content:
Pixel3XL:

After Android 11 my recent apps no longer show up. If I swipe up and hold for a second you can feel a slight vibration and the screen changes color, but nothing shows up.

Sometimes if I slowly slide up and hold, with an app open, it will show that app. But as you try to swipe one way or the other there's nothing to swipe to and I know there are other apps open.

Cleaned cache, storage and force closed the app.

Here is what i see when in the "recent apps" area...
category: Homescreen and Launcher, Google Pixel 3 XL
